attributes.action: BAN THE SCHOOL RUN AND ENCOURAGE KIDS TO WALK OR CATCH THE BUS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: AS ANYBODY WHO HAS TO DRIVE TO WORK KNOWS. WHEN THE KIDS ARE ON HOLIDAY THERE IS AT LEAST 30% LESS CONGESTION ON THE ROADS. THIS IS BECAUSE OF IRRESPONSIBLE PARENTS CLOGGING UP THE ROADS AND CREATING VERY DANGEROUS SITUATIONS OUT SIDE SCHOOLS.STOP THIS NOW BY BANNING THE SCHOOL RUN AND ENCOURAGING KIDS TO GET FIT AND WALK TO SCHOOL OR CATCH THE BUS. IF SAFETY IS A FEAR THEN THIS IS NOT A PROBLEM AS KIDS COULD WALK IN GROUPS WITH FRIENDS OR THE LASY PARENTS COULD WALK WITH THEN.JUST THINK OF HOW MUCH LESS POLLOUTION THERE WOULD BE OUT SIDE OF THE SCHOOL FROM THESE CARS AND HOW MUCH SAFER THE ROAD WOULD BE

rejection.details: This petition is fine, but you need to address the excessive use of capital letters. It makes the petition very hard to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
